titleStmt.title: The clarret drinkers song, or, The good fellows design by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Oldham; also attributed by NUC pre-1956 imprints to Thomas Brown.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
